---
title: Typography
description: Overview of the typography system and text tokens in Apsara.
---

Apsara provides a comprehensive typography system with carefully crafted font families, sizes, weights, and spacing to ensure readable and consistent text across your application.

## Font Families

Apsara includes three font family categories for different use cases.

<TokenTable
  type="typography"
  tokens={[
    { name: "--rs-font-title", value: "Inter, sans-serif", description: "Headings and titles" },
    { name: "--rs-font-body", value: "Inter, sans-serif", description: "Body text and paragraphs" },
    { name: "--rs-font-mono", value: "Menlo, JetBrains Mono, monospace", description: "Code and technical content" },
  ]}
/>

## Style Variants

Apsara supports different style variants that change typography to match your design preference.

### Traditional Style

When using `data-style="traditional"`, the font families change to:

<TokenTable
  type="typography"
  tokens={[
    { name: "--rs-font-title", value: "Lora, serif", description: "Title font in traditional style" },
    { name: "--rs-font-body", value: "Josefin Sans, sans-serif", description: "Body font in traditional style" },
  ]}
/>

## Usage

```css
/* Body text */
.paragraph {
  font-family: var(--rs-font-body);
  font-size: var(--rs-font-size-regular);
  font-weight: var(--rs-font-weight-regular);
  line-height: var(--rs-line-height-regular);
  letter-spacing: var(--rs-letter-spacing-regular);
}

/* Headings */
.heading {
  font-family: var(--rs-font-title);
  font-size: var(--rs-font-size-t2);
  font-weight: var(--rs-font-weight-medium);
  line-height: var(--rs-line-height-t2);
}

/* Code */
.code {
  font-family: var(--rs-font-mono);
  font-size: var(--rs-font-size-mono-small);
  line-height: var(--rs-line-height-mono-small);
}

/* Small text */
.caption {
  font-size: var(--rs-font-size-small);
  line-height: var(--rs-line-height-small);
  letter-spacing: var(--rs-letter-spacing-small);
}
```

## Best Practices

- **Use semantic sizing** - Match font sizes to their intended purpose (body, titles, code)
- **Pair sizes with line heights** - Always use the corresponding line height token for each font size
- **Maintain hierarchy** - Use font weights and sizes to establish clear visual hierarchy
- **Consider readability** - Use appropriate letter spacing for different text sizes
